thread.title: Donald Trump appropriately owns a gold golf driver
thread.title_full: Donald Trump appropriately owns a gold golf driver

author: Sara Harris (sharris@sportingnews.com)
title: Donald Trump appropriately owns a gold golf driver
text:
12am   9:12am EST Donald Trump loves the color gold, so this is only appropriate. (Getty Images) 
Updated at 9:12  12 a.m. ET 
Donald Trump loves the color gold. 
From the gold drapes in the White House to his gold-covered penthouse in New York , the 45th president can't seem to get enough of the color. 
So it only makes sense that he would be the proud owner of a gold driver, thanks to the Japanese Prime Minister Shinzō Abe. Here's the $3,755 gold, anti-slice golf driver Shinzo Abe gave Trump a few months ago pic.twitter.com/tWDWDzAbyq 
MORE: Donald Trump, Mark Cuban engage in Sunday morning Twitter sparring session 
On Sunday, Trump was photographed with the driver in Florida. In @POLITICO Playbook: Palm Beach update: pix of Trump on driving range + inside Steve Schwarzman's 70th bday bash: https://t.co/eyJAECTeGb pic.twitter.com/WlY2xU0Use — Daniel Lippman (@dlippman) February 12, 2017 Watch This
